Components.Abstract.Abstraction

Interface IAbstractionComp

  • All Superinterfaces:
    INodeObject, IPAMOJAComponent
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CAbstractionComp

    public interface IAbstractionComp
extends INodeObject
    Provides services for interacting with other components ( like, AST, ParseTree and Parser components) and the node factory.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • setParseTree

        void setParseTree(IParseTreeComp aParseTree)
        Connects to the ParseTree component via its interface. Registers for property change events, retrieves the parse tree object and rebuilds its AST.
        Parameters:
        aParseTree - new value of ParseTree

      • getParseTree

        IParseTreeComp getParseTree()
        Accesses the interface of the ParseTree component.
        Returns:
        the ParseTree component's interface.

      • setParser

        void setParser(IParserComp aParser)
        Connect to a parser component via its interface. Register for property change events, retrieve current value of parse tree object and rebuild the AST.
        Parameters:
        aParser - the parser interface.

      • getParser

        IParserComp getParser()
        Access the interface of a Parser component.
        Returns:
        the Parser interface.

      • setAST

        void setAST(CNode aAST)
        Set the value of AST
        Parameters:
        aAST - new value of AST

      • getAST

        CNode getAST()
        Return the value of AST
        Returns:
        the value of AST

      • setNodeFactory

        void setNodeFactory(CNodeFactory aNodeFactory)
        Set the NodeFactory object for creating AST nodes.
        Parameters:
        aNodeFactory - the CNodefactory object.
